topPRs.title: CodeRabbit Generated Unit Tests: Add comprehensive unit tests for pipeline config, contributors, export, ingest, and summarize modules
topPRs.author: coderabbitai
topPRs.body:
Unit test generation was requested by @META-DREAMER.

* https://github.com/elizaOS/elizaos.github.io/pull/137#issuecomment-3010731295

The following files were modified:

* `config/pipeline.config.test.ts`
* `src/lib/pipelines/contributors/calculateTags.test.ts`
* `src/lib/pipelines/contributors/contributorScores.test.ts`
* `src/lib/pipelines/contributors/fetchAllContributors.test.ts`

* `src/lib/pipelines/summarize/queries.test.ts`

topPRs.title: Update contributor pipelines to handle multi-repo aggregation
topPRs.author: META-DREAMER
topPRs.body:
User scores / summaries no longer operate on a repo level

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Enhanced contributor and user scoring to aggregate data across all repositories, providing global insights rather than per-repository breakdowns.
  * Contributor summaries and AI-generated reports now clearly attribute activities to their source repositories for improved clarity.

* **Refactor**
  * Streamlined contributor pipelines to process users collectively across multiple repositories instead of iterating per repository.
  * Updated data queries and metrics calculations to remove repository-specific filters and support global aggregation.
  * Improved formatting of pull request and issue references to consistently include repository names.

* **Chores**
  * Removed unused imports and updated documentation to reflect new aggregation approach.
  * Added two new repositories for tracking and updated AI summary models to Google Gemini series.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
